scripts.//: VERIFY THAT THE CORRECT BUCKER IS USED

scriptsComments.start: react-script start which sets up a development environment and starts a server, as well as hot module reloading, used to make fast chages on the front end. Entry point index.js
scriptsComments.build: Runs client build first and server build second so the server side rendering app can point to the hydration bundle
scriptsComments.client-build: Creates the js bundel for hydration of the react app. Bundles the css, points the paths to the assets folder and gives unique names to the assets. Everything is stored in clientBuild folder
scriptsComments.server-build: Creates the server side rendering bundle
scriptsComments.upload-test-data: Uploads all the files and folders in the cypress/fixture/bucket to the bucket VERIFY URL FOR BUCKET
